# GCT-TA

GC-TA is a technical analysis library used as part of [GoCryptoTrader](https://github.com/thrasher-corp/gocryptotrader)
This project orignally started off as a fork of [go-talib](https://github.com/markcheno/go-talib)

Supported indicators so far:

- Average True Range
- Bollinger Bands
- Simple Moving Average
- Exponential Moving Average
- MACD
- Money Flow Index
- On Balance Volume 
- RSI
- Correlation Coefficient

## Install

Install the package with:

```bash
go get github.com/thrasher-corp/gct-ta
```

Import it with:

```go
import "github.com/thrasher-corp/gct-ta/indicators"
```


## Example

```go

    "fmt"

    ret := indicators.OBV(testClose, testVolume)
    fmt.Println(ret)

```
